resources.string: 1 bedroom + loft, 1 bathroom, sleeps 4 \n Your Log Cabin on Ivey Lake awaits! Nestled above the Pemberton Valley with access to fishing, golfing, hiking mountain biking on your doorstep. Only 15 mins from Pemberton, 40 mins from Whistler. The "Hummingbird Cabin" is fully equipped with kitchen,
